data.comment: The match goes to penalties!
Javier Salas (Puebla) fails to convert his penalty!
In the minute 0, Dorlan Pabon (Monterrey) succeeds from the penalty spot.
Osvaldo Martinez (Puebla) scores!
Nicolas Sanchez (Monterrey) misses his penalty attempt!
In the minute 0, Nicolas Vikonis (Puebla) converts his penalty!
Rogelio Funes Mori (Monterrey) scores from the penalty spot.
Santiago Ormeno (Puebla) converts his penalty!
In the minute 0, Sebastian Vegas (Monterrey) misses his penalty attempt!
George Corral (Puebla) succeeds from the penalty spot.
The penalty shootout is over. The final score is 2-4.
The match is underway in Monterrey.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Puebla drives forward and Pablo Gonzalez Diaz gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
Free kick Puebla.
In the minute 4, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Monterrey.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 5, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Monterrey throw-in in Puebla's half.
In the minute 7, In Monterrey Monterrey's Vincent Janssen is caught offside.
Santiago Ormeno (Puebla) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Monterrey.
In the minute 11, Monterrey push forward at Estadio BBVA Bancomer and Vincent Janssen gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Puebla defence.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Puebla drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 12, Monterrey drive upfield and Carlos Rodriguez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Puebla defender.
Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 15, Monterrey surge into the attack at Estadio BBVA Bancomer but Rogelio Funes Moriâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Monterrey close to the penalty box.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 19, Monterrey to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Monterrey throw-in in Puebla's half.
Monterrey's Vincent Janssen gets in a shot on goal at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 21, Fernando Guerrero awards the away team a throw-in.
Rogelio Funes Mori of Monterrey gets in a strike, but is off target.
Fernando Guerrero awards Puebla a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Monterrey defence as Omar Fernandez fires in a strike for Puebla.
In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Puebla in the half of Monterrey.
Puebla's Nestor Vicente Vidrio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monterrey.
In the minute 29, Throw-in high up the field for Monterrey in Monterrey.
Monterrey are pushing forward but Carlos Rodriguez's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 31, Fernando Guerrero signals a throw-in for Monterrey, close to Puebla's area.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 37, In Monterrey Monterrey drive forward through Rogelio Funes Mori. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Puebla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monterrey's half?
Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
In the minute 39, Puebla have a dangerous throw-in.
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, An attacking Monterrey player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Nicolas Sanchez converts the penalty to give Monterrey a 1-0 lead.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Monterrey.
Free kick Monterrey.
Monterrey's Carlos Rodriguez is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 48, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Monterrey have been awarded a penalty in Monterrey...
Monterrey are going well in Monterrey. They now lead 2-0 thanks to a Vincent Janssen penalty.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Juan Reynoso (Puebla) is making a first substitution, with Osvaldo Martinez replacing Pablo Gonzalez Diaz.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, In Monterrey, Monterrey push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Puebla.
Goal! Osvaldo Martinez pulls one back for Puebla to make it 2-1.
In the minute 62, In Monterrey Monterrey attack through Jesus Gallardo. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Monterrey.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 63, Javier Salas for Puebla has been booked by Fernando Guerrero and receives a first yellow card.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Monterrey throw-in in Puebla's half.
Throw-in Monterrey.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of Puebla.
Fernando Guerrero awards the away team a throw-in.
Monterrey needs to be cautious. Puebla have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 69, The home team replace Vincent Janssen with Sebastian Vegas.
Aviles Hurtado is replacing Arturo Gonzalez for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 74, In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Stefan Medina (Monterrey) gets a yellow card.
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 76, Monterrey to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Puebla pushes forward through George Corral, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 78, Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 80, Free kick Puebla.
Juan Reynoso is making the team's second substitution at Estadio BBVA Bancomer with Amaury Escoto replacing Omar Fernandez.
Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori breaks free at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Fernando Guerrero awards Puebla a goal kick.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Maximiliano Meza with Miguel Layun. This is the third substitution made today by Antonio Mohamed.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 87, Matias Kranevitter for Monterrey gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Angel Zapata is replacing Carlos Rodriguez for the home team.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Puebla.
Throw-in Puebla.
At Estadio BBVA Bancomer the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monterrey advance rapidly upfield but Fernando Guerrero blows for offside.
Free kick for Puebla in the half of Monterrey.
The score after normal time is 2-2.
Goal! The away team is awarded a penalty in Monterrey. Santiago Ormeno converts to level the scoring at 2-2.
Monterrey make their fifth substitution with Dorlan Pabon replacing Jesus Gallardo.
Juan Reynoso (Puebla) is making a third substitution, with Daniel Aguilar replacing Brayan Angulo.
Bernardo Cuesta is on a sub for Daniel Alvarez for Puebla.
